description:
A set of 3 skins that change the appearance of Lila's weapon.
Weapon skins can be changed  from the diary on the desk in Ryza's room or from the desk in her atelier.
Note: This content only changes the appearance of the weapon. Weapon performance is unaffected.

Note: This product is included in the Season Pass.  Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
name: Stylish Weapon Skins - Lila
